item.description:
Lets go out and dance! If you don't dance that's OK, join us for drinks and conversation.
The Lighthouse Bar at Twin Rivers Casino in Lincoln, RI has great live bands on weekends.. and there is NO cover charge. 11/20/09 will be a Disco band... Remember disco? I do and remember that was when line dancing started and people starting dancing in groups.... So hustle on down and have some fun listening and dancing to Disco Inferno. The band starts at 8:30 so lets get there at 7:30 so we can get seats and drinks and talk before the band starts! Bring your dancing shoes and your smiles!

8:30 pm @ Lighthouse Bar
Disco Inferno is the East Coast's hottest and most authentic "Flashback to the '70's" band. This group combines great dance music from the disco/funk era with a fun, interactive stage show that appeals to people of all ages! Meet other FUN members from this group! Guaranteed FUN!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Lighthouse Bar - Look for the Meetup Signs and familiar faces!
item.name: HEY - LET'S GO DANCING!!!!
